title: Common Logarithm
text: If we only have $$\ln\left(x\right)$$, i.e., we don't see a base $$b$$ as in logb(x), what is the base?

title: Round
text: We get $$-1.39794$$. To round to nearest thousandth, we check that the third decimal place is less or equal $$\frac{to}{greater}$$ than $$5$$. If equal $$\frac{to}{greater}$$ than $$5$$, we round up to the next thousandth.
